DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_005_b: I came here so that I could save Zora's Domain...
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_007_c: I'll do all I can. Just as my ancestor did.
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_011_bb: I am the Sage of Water. Behold! This is my new power!
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_003_c: It's my destiny to fight by your side.
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_018_c:
With that ring, you will always have my power
with you!
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_008_b: I will accept this secret stone!
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_014_b:
I, Sidon, the Sage of Water, swear that I will fight
by your side.
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_006_c: but it looks like all of Hyrule will need my help!
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_019_b:
We're partnered up again! Yes! All right, let's
head back home.
DmT_ZO_Awake_Text_015_b: Please accept this! It is proof of my vow.
